remarks: Rederivation of axiom ~ ax-4 from ~ ax-c4 and other older axioms.  See ~ axc4 for the derivation of ~ ax-c4 from ~ ax-4 .  (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2008.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax4 $p |- ( A. x ( ph -> ps ) -> ( A. x ph -> A. x ps ) ) $.
